title: Kenneth Cole Reaction Landscape Duvet Collection at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: Give your bedroom a modern and urban update with the Landscape duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. A jagged linear design in sandstone decorates a luxurious cotton sateen face for a bed that's unmatched in comfort and style. Thanks for watching.

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/Kenneth-Cole-Reaction-Home-Landscape-Duvet-Cover/210155?. 
Give your bedroom a modern and urban update with the Landscape duvet cover by Kenneth Cole Reaction Home. A jagged linear design in sandstone decorates a luxurious cotton sateen face for a bed that's unmatched in comfort and style. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: The landscape duvet cover and bedding collection by Kenneth Cole reaction home was designed exclusively for Bed Bath and Beyond. The first layer of the bed begins with a creme sateen sheet set featuring an embroidered Baroda stitch and warm tones at the hem of the sheet and pillow shams, adding a subtle dressmakers detail. The euro shams add an ideal  backdrop to the bed, they are cotton velvet and meek with bronze tinted studs. The landscape duvet cover and pillow shams are cotton sateen with a touch of metallic. There is a multi-colored variegated horizontal pattern running down the center of the bed. The decorative pillows accenting this beds suite are  a lush faux fur pillow, with canvas reverse in snow. An origami inspired felt pleated pillow in charcoal,  and an urban silver distressed faux leather pillow. The pillows add the key fashion elements to complete. The landscape duvet cover and bedding is part of the Kenneth Cole  reaction home collection. It is available exclusively online and at select Bed Bath and Beyond stores.
